wrapup.speaker: cal_endar
wrapup.content:
How did
you beat
my minions?

wrapup.speaker: cal_endar
wrapup.content:
Well,
there's no
way you
earned...

wrapup.speaker: cal_endar
wrapup.content:
enough
points to
save the
date!

wrapup.speaker: hero
wrapup.content:
Oh, you
mean this
many points?

wrapup.speaker: cal_endar
wrapup.content:
I'm a
beast of
my word.

confrontation.speaker: cal_endar
confrontation.content:
I'm sorry,
but I needed
these points...

confrontation.speaker: cal_endar
confrontation.content:
for a party
that I'm
throwing...

confrontation.speaker: date
confrontation.content:
That's what
we want to
do too!
